text:
Katie Holmes celebrated her daughter Suri Cruise's birthday with not one but three birthday cakes! The proud mum shared a photo of the trio of treats, each beautifully decorated with flowers and strawberries. The Dawson's Creek actress captioned the snap: "A very HAPPY BIRTHDAY to my sweetie." Fans were quick to wish the daughter of Katie and Tom Cruise many happy returns, with one writing: "Our daughters share the same birthday. Only mine is turning 16 today! Enjoy every moment." Perez Hilton also commented on the post, writing: "Happy birthday! Can't believe she's 11 already!"

READ: Katie Holmes and Jamie Foxx spotted on secret dinner date

Katie shared a photo of Suri's birthday cakes

Katie also shared a black-and-white photo of birthday balloons, and simply captioned the picture with several balloon emojis. The 38-year-old has been spending plenty of time with her daughter recently, as they enjoyed a trip to the beach for Easter weekend. Katie shared several photos of the trip, which included a snap of her hugging her little girl and the family trying out parasailing together. According to E! News, the group holidayed at the Marco Island Beach Resort in Florida, with a source telling the magazine: "They've been enjoying beach days and trips to the local ice cream shop."

READ: Suri Cruise enjoys a pamper day with doting mum Katie Holmes

© Photo: Instagram

Katie threw a birthday party for Suri

The actress recently opened up about raising Suri in the spotlight. Chatting on The View, she said: "I raise my child like [how] my family, sisters raise their children and how I was raised. I love being a parent and I feel really blessed to have such a sweet little girl. I am the baby of five. I have a lot of cousins. I'm the youngest grandchild on the Holmes side. So I have an amazing family and we're always in Ohio. I'm really proud of my nieces and nephews."
title: Suri Cruise celebrates 11th birthday with three cakes!
